Seafood Fare with a tex-mex flair

A Seafood Cantina located on the sunny isle of James Island, South Carolina, Grumpy Goat specializes in light seafood fare with a Tex-Mex flare.
Read more about us Parties 
Book your next party with us!

Grumpy Goat would be honored to provide our services for your next event. Each event is bespoke to your tastes and needs, to provide the best experience possible for you and your guests.

Reviews

review by - Yelp

Kay J:

Stopped in twice with no disappointments ! Good cocktails and excellent food ! Prices are reasonable and it's sort of a place for locals. Very relaxed atmosphere with a outside patio...

review by - Yelp

Treva J:

Our first visit and we were thrilled! Staff was polite and engaging, the decor was fabulous and the food, Out of the world! So glad we found this gem! We will be back many, many times...

review by - Yelp

Maria V:

Possibly the best shrimp and grits I have ever had!!!! I loved the twist they put on it. If we are ever back in Charleston this place is a must!!! Small place and easy to pass up..... but you need to stop in here!

review by - Yelp

Greg B:

One of our local favorites! Sat out back on a beautiful night! It was also margarita Monday! Can't beat it! Good food and great service!

review by - Yelp

Bralyn S:

This is one of my favorites on James Island. I eat there now after the first time probably three times a week. Stephanie and John O are the best. The best food and best service on the island...
